get.description:
List all menus with pagination and filters.

Requires menu:list permission.

schema.title: Response Create Menu Api V1 Menus Post

get.description:
Get complete menu tree (without permission filtering).

For admin use. Requires menu:list permission.

Get current user's menu tree.

Returns menu tree based on user's permissions.

schema.title: Response Get User Menu Tree Api V1 Menus User Get

get.description:
Get menu by ID.

Requires menu:query permission.

schema.title: Response Update Menu Api V1 Menus  Menu Id  Put
Response Delete Menu Api V1 Menus  Menu Id  Delete

get.description:
Get all departments (flat list).

Requires permission: dept:list

schema.title: Response List Departments Api V1 Departments Get

post.description:
Create a new department.

Requires permission: dept:create

schema.title: Response Create Department Api V1 Departments Post

get.description:
Get department tree structure.

Requires permission: dept:list

schema.title: Response Get Department Tree Api V1 Departments Tree Get

get.description:
Get department details.

Requires permission: dept:query

schema.title: Response Get Department Api V1 Departments  Dept Id  Get

put.description:
Update a department.

Requires permission: dept:update

schema.title: Response Update Department Api V1 Departments  Dept Id  Put

delete.description:
Delete a department (soft delete).

Requires permission: dept:delete

schema.title: Response Delete Department Api V1 Departments  Dept Id  Delete

get.description:

post.description:

get.description:
Get permission tree.

get.description:

Update a role.

delete.description:
